result_list.explanation: Regarder (watch) is a general character action.
Jouer (play) is a general character action.
result_list.stgdir: Plusieurs groupes de Bergers et de Bergères jouant à divers jeux.

result_list.explanation: Regardant du côté opposé (looking in the opposite direction) is a movement.
Boire (drink) is a general character action.
Ouvrir le papier (open the paper) is an interaction with an object.
result_list.stgdir: Il ouvre le papier, et y trouve une Ode sur un triomphe d'amour.

result_list.explanation: Lui montrer (show him) is a non-verbal interaction.
result_list.stgdir: Il leur montre un mur qu'on tourne sur un pivot de fer.

result_list.explanation: Lui montrant une lettre (showing him a letter) is a non-verbal interaction.
Se mettre à table (sit at the table) is a general character action.
Continuer de regarder (continue to watch) is a general character action.
La pendule sonne six heures (the clock chimes six o'clock) describes a setting or play location.
